item.title: Becky add a quote by Ann Rinaldi
item.description: "A person doesn't ask permission to fall in love; not even of themselves." -- Ann Rinaldi

item.title: Becky add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Becky add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Parry Otter, the Chosen Boy Who — well — something of that sort.." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Becky add a quote by Jamie Ford
item.description: "The hardest choices in life aren't between what's right and what's wrong but between what's right and what's best." -- Jamie Ford

item.title: Becky add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I used to think that when people fell in love, they just landed where they landed, and they had no choice in the matter afterward. And maybe that's true of beginnings, but it's not true of this, now." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Becky add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I fell in love with him. But I don't just stay with him by default as if there's no one else available to me. I stay with him because I choose to, every day that I wake up, every day that we fight or lie to each other or disappoint each other. I choose him over and over again, and he chooses me." -- Veronica Roth
